original: BLOMQVIST, Nils Sigfrid, Bankdirektör, Åmål, f Brålanda, Älvsb l, 6/5 95 av folkskoll J S B o Anna Janson, gm Greta Abenius. Vänersborgs hal. Bokh Ensk Bkn i Veners-borg 11, kass 15, kamr AB Dalslands Bk 18, vkst dir Åmåls Sparbk sed. 29, huv.man o v. styr.ordf där. Stdsflm. Ordf Åmåls Luft-sk.frn o Åmåls Högerfrn, v. ordf o skattm Dalsl Sångarfrb, skattm Scoutfrämj på Dal, sekr. Åmåls fastigh.äg.frn, styr.led Skarab o Älvsb l Sparbksfrn, led förtroenderådet f Hedbergska stift f värnlösa. Resor: Belg, Danm, Holl, Norge, Tyskl. Sv Sångarfrbs ftjtg, Dalsl Sångarfrbs GM, Försäkr AB Nornans GM, Finska vinterkr MM. Hobbies: Friluftsliv, fiske.
translated: BLOMQVIST, Nils Sigfrid, Bank Director, Åmål, born in Brålanda, Älvsborgs län, on 6th May 1895, son of J.S.B. and Anna Janson, married to Greta Abenius. Employed at Vänersborgs Handelsbank, Accountant at Enskilda Banken in Vänersborg in 1911, Cashier in 1915, Assistant Manager at AB Dalslands Bank in 1918, Deputy Director at Åmåls Sparbank since 1929, Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board there. Member of Åmåls Luftskärmsförening (Air Protection Association) and Åmåls Högerförening (Right Party Association), Vice Chairman and Treasurer of Dalslands Sångarförbund (Singers Association), Treasurer of Scoutfrämjandet på Dal (Scout Association in Dalarna), Secretary of Åmåls Fastighetsägareförening (Property Owners Association), Member of the Board of Skaraborgs län and Älvsborgs län Sparbanksförening (Savings Bank Association), Member of the Trustee Council of Hedbergska stiftelsen för värnlösa (Hedbergs Foundation for the Needy). Has traveled to Belgium, Denmark, Netherlands, Norway, and Germany. Member of Svenska Sångarförbundets Förbundstjänstgöringsförening (Association for the Service of the Swedish Singers Association), Dalslands Sångarförbund's Honorary Member, Försäkrings AB Nordan's Honorary Member, Finnish Winter War Veterans' Association. Hobbies include outdoor life and fishing.
